data.title: Advanced Business Solution
data.meta_description: Our vision is to become a strong local and international leading information technology solution provider by giving birth to business oriented solutions.
data.text:
ABS is an Elite Level Partner for McAfee in Oman; McAfee is the world leader in proactively secures systems and networks from known and as-yet-undiscovered threats worldwide.

About McAfee

The company was founded in 1989 as McAfee Associates, named for its founder John McAfee.McAfee creates best-of-breed computer security solutions that prevent intrusions on networks and protect computer systems from the next generation of blended attacks and threats. It has a lot of product such as Data Protection, Email & Web Security, Endpoint Protection, Network Security and Security-as-a-Service (SaaS).Today McAfee announced its intention to acquire privately owned Sentrigo, a leading provider of database security, including vulnerability management, database activity monitoring, database audit, and virtual patching â which ensure databases are protected without impacting performance or availability.

Learn more about Mcafee : www.mcafee.com

ABS is a Gold Partner with the Oracle Corporation, which is an American multinational computer technology corporation. The company specializes in developing and marketing computer hardware systems and enterprise software products â particularly its own brands of database management systems.

We cater to all the major aspects of application requirements and deploy Oracle applications for the following purposes:

Enterprise Performance Management

Customer Relationship Management

Financial Management

Human Capital Management

Project Management

Supply Chain Management

Oracle Technology Products

ABS is single one-stop solution provider for all Oracle E-Business Suite consulting services:

Database Administration

Real Application Clusters

Installation, Configuration and Upgrades

Migrations

Advance Oracle Server Management

Oracle Technical Training

Learn more about ORACLE : www.oracle.com

ABS is an Authorized Partner for IBM Maximo; which is the world leader in strategic asset and service management solutions.

About IBM Maximo

IBM Maximo was established in 1996, the Companyâs flagship solution, is delivered on a web-architected platform and increases productivity, optimizes asset performance and service levels, reduces costs and enables asset-related sourcing and procurement across the entire spectrum of strategic assets.

Today there are over 25,000 end users of IBM Maximo software in the Middle East and North Africa. There is over 110 full time IBM Maximo dedicated staff based in the Gulf region.

Learn more about IBM Maximo: www.maximo.ae

ABS is an Authorized Partner for Avigilon. Avigilon (TSX: AVO) is defining the future of protection through innovative high-definition surveillance solutions.

About Avigilon:

Founded in 2004, we design and manufacture high-definition surveillance solutions that deliver the best evidence. Our open, industry-leading HD network video management software and megapixel cameras are reinventing surveillance by providing the worldâs best image quality.

With our open components you can customize your own powerful, scalable and cost-effective surveillance solution. With all of our hardware and software designed and manufactured in Canada, you will always get the best quality and the most reliable products in the industry.

Avigilon systems protect and monitor various locations worldwide including major corporations, government institutions, stadiums, retail environments, casinos, critical infrastructure, transportation stations, and more, providing the best evidence possible.

Learn more about Avigilon on: Avigilon.com

ABS is an Authorized Partner for EMC; which is the world leader in information storage, management, as well as disaster recovery solutions.Established in 1979, EMC Corporation (NYSE: EMC) is a U.S. provider of information infrastructure systems, software and services. It is headquartered in Hopkinton, Massachusetts, , The United States. EMC Corporation is the worldâs leading developer and provider of information infrastructure technology and solutions that enable organizations of all sizes to transform the way they complete and create value from their information.Today, EMC employ approximately 40,000 people worldwide, and represented by approximately 400 sales offices and scores of partners in more than 60 countries around the world. EMC successfully achieved annual revenue of US$ 14.1 billion in 2009.

Learn more about EMC on: www.emc.com

ABS is a Authorized Partner for CA; which is the world leader in managing and securing IT environments, enabling customer to deliver more flexible IT services.

About CA

CA (NYSE: CA), one of the world's largest information technology (IT) management software companies, unifies and simplifies the management of enterprise?wide IT in a secure way for greater business results. CA tools and expertise help customers manage risk, improve service, manage costs and align their IT investments with their business needs.

This new approach, Enterprise IT Management (EITM), is CA vision for how customers can close the gap between the promise of IT and what it actually delivers. CA makes it possible for customers to manage all of the people, the processes, the computers, applications, systems, security, networks and databases that make up their computing environments, whether distributed or mainframe, and regardless of the hardware or software they are using.

Today, CA employs 13, 200 people worldwide and serves more than 98 percent of the Global 1000 companies, as well as government organizations, educational institutions and thousands of other companies in diverse industries worldwide.

Learn more about CA on: www.CA.com

ABS works closely with SAP in the region on Enterprise Solutions requirements

About SAP

Headquartered in Walldorf, Germany, SAP is the market leader in enterprise application software. Founded in 1972, SAP has a rich history of innovation and growth as a true industry leader. SAP applications and services enable more than 176,000 customers worldwide to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably. With revenue (IFRS) of â¬12.5 billion for the year 2010, SAP has more than 54,000 employees and sales and development locations in more than 50 countries worldwide.

SAP is listed on several exchanges, including the Frankfurt stock exchange and NYSE, under the symbol "SAP."

Learn more about SAP on: www.SAP.com

ABS is an Authorized Partner for Fujitsu; which is a Japanese information and communication technology (ICT) company offering a full range of technology products, solutions and services. Approximately 170,000 Fujitsu people support customers in more than 100 countries. Fujitsu uses their experience and the power of ICT to shape the future of society with our customers.

Learn more about Fujitsu on: www.fujitsu.com

ABS is an Authorized Partner for C-Track; which is the world leader in fleet management,meet the growing requirement for GPS/GSM based fleet management and vehicle location based services.

About C-Track

C-Track is Americas forms part of the Digicore Group, which is a global company.Trakker ME(TME) was established in 1991 to provide Services catering to Advanced and Customized Fleet Management through various Fleet Management Solutions to help companies of various sizes better manage their fleet of vehicles by identifying their driverâs problem and correct their unsafe behavior prior to suffering the consequences of a vehicle accident and improving their HSE road safety standards â identify and supervise the driving team, increase productivity, reduce unnecessary overheads and expenditures as a result of maintenance, optimal utilization and fuel cost.

The most significant influence on the Ctrack GPS/GPRS fleet management systems has been the rapid increase in fuel costs, now firmly in place as the most important issue facing most fleet managers globally. Ctrackâs sophisticated backend software can help route planning to minimise overall distance travelled by multiple vehicles.

Today over 50,000 vehicles with more than 15 000 customers receiving their vehiclesâ information in real time from this facility. The gateway now also supports the new Ctrack Connect web interface which shows vehicle information to customers worldwide on local maps and in local time.

Learn more about C-Track:www.ctrack.com

ABS is an Authorized Partner for QMS; which is a leading company in customer flow management system that allows you to organize your customers in an efficient and effective way on the basis of smart and intelligent business and environmental based indicators and parameters.

About QMS :

Queue Systems since its establishment in 1981 and has established its reputation with a comprehensive range of products including QMS, SQ, DG and DCS. QMS300i is a top-of-the-line computerized ticket queue system designed for managing customer queues at service counters or rooms. It is ideal for banks, hospitals, clinics, government service centers and utility bill payment counters. The QMS components are QMS server, counter terminal, virtual counter terminal, ticket printer, terminal, advance display, multimedia main display, signal converter, video module and power supply Hubs & UPS.

ABS is Authorized Partner for PITSS; which is the leading supplier of fully integrated solutions for effective management of Oracle Forms applications.The innovative PITSS.CON software helps its customers to analyze, migrate, upgrade and maintain their Oracle Forms applications in its entirety. PITSS thus opens an evolutionary path for the migration of Oracle Forms applications to a Service Oriented Architecture (SOA).PITSS.CON has earned a reputation through its high level of automation and performance. Migration and development projects are run rapidly, economically and reliably within shortest possible time frames. With PITSS.CON, companies achieve an average cost saving of 30% for regular development projects and up to 90% for upgrade projects.

Learn more about PITTS.CON on: www.Pitss.com

ABS is an Authorized Partner for VMware which is radically transforming IT with technologies that make your business more agile, efficient and profitable. A pioneer in virtualization and policy-driven automation, VMware simplifies IT complexity across the entire data center. We deliver value to more than 500,000 customers through virtualization software, professional services and a robust ecosystem of more than 55,000 partners that drives application interoperability and customer choice.

Learn more about VMware on: www.VMware.com
